2) "The Rocker" (2008): This engaging comedy-drama film directed by Jonathan Mostow features a talented cast including Howard Hesseman as Rocker's Manager, Josh Gad as Rocker's Nephew, Josh Gad as Rocker's Nephew, Jeff Garlin as Rocker's Uncle, Bradley Cooper as Rocker, Bradley Cooper as Rocker, Fred Armisen as Rocker's Brother-in-law, Demetri Martin as Rocker's Brother-in-law, Jane Krakowski as Rocker's Cousin, Rainn Wilson as Rocker's Boss, Aziz Ansari as Rocker's Business Partner, Jane Lynch as Rocker's Sister-in-law, Emma Stone as Rocker's Ex-girlfriend.

conversation.text:
Based on the user's preferences, I would recommend "Mansfield Park". The movie is based on Jane Austen's novel and features an impressive cast including Vivien Leigh as Elizabeth Bennet, also known as LadyIP and LadyIP2, and Richard Burton as Mr. Darcy.

"Mansfield Park" tells the story of a young woman named Elizabeth Bennet who is sent to live with her cousin LadyIP in Mansfield Park, Westmoreland County, Pennsylvania. LadyIP is a wealthy and powerful landowner who has a reputation for being cruel and oppressive towards his tenants. LadyIP is also known as LadyIP2 because she was the second daughter of James Stuart, 1st Earl of Fife.
